actions.text: On agreeing to the Smith (NE) amendment (A015) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Smith (NE) amendment (A015) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A015) offered by Mr. Smith (NE).

description: An amendment numbered 68 printed in Part A of House Report 115-650 to direct the Comptroller General to assess the current state of the aviation workforce, barriers to entry to the aviation workforce, and options to increase the future supply of individuals in the aviation workforce.
purpose: An amendment numbered 68 printed in Part A of House Report 115-650 to direct the Comptroller General to assess the current state of the aviation workforce, barriers to entry to the aviation workforce, and options to increase the future supply of individuals in the aviation workforce.
